item.title: Ad sharks
item.description: I don’t own a TV, but there’s one at my gym. This morning, there was this… infomercial? I don’t know how to call it, it lasted at least an hour and had the tone of the usual off-hour Japanese TV. Programs that try, not very hard, to be both entertainment and journalistic news. Of course it was interspaced by plenty of ads. The topic was shark fishing, and how eating them keeps you young.
